titles.title: SARA Act of 2014
Sexual Assault Reporting on Aircraft Act of 2014
To direct the Attorney General to acquire data, for each calendar year, about sexual offenses, including rape, that occur aboard aircraft.

bill.summary: 4/4/2014--Introduced. Sexual Assault Reporting on Aircraft Act of 2014 or SARA Act of 2014 - Directs the Attorney General to acquire data, for each calendar year, about sexual offenses, including rape, that occur aboard passenger aircraft.
